results.title: The Association of Metformin With Heart Failure in Patients With Diabetes Mellitus Receiving Anthracycline Chemotherapy
results.text_hl: None of the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ who stopped taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ developed @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@HF@@@.

results.title: Effect of metformin on left ventricular mass and functional parameters in non-diabetic patients: a meta-analysis of randomized clinical trials
results.text_hl: Meta-regression analysis was used to assess the association of @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@HF@@@), @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ dose, and duration with the SMCC.

results.title: Sodium-glucose cotransporter 2 inhibitor versus metformin as first-line therapy in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus: a multi-institution database study
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@, SGLT2i as first-line treatment may be associated with decreased events of @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ hospitalization, @DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@acute coronary syndrome@@@, and all-cause mortality, compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as first-line treatment.

results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment is associated with improved outcome in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@advanced heart failure@@@ (@DISEASE_Heart_Failure_Systolic @DISEASE_MESH:D054143 @@@HFrEF@@@)

results.title: Cardiovascular outcomes associated with treatment of type 2 diabetes in patients with ischaemic heart failure
results.text_hl: Numerous observational studies have reported beneficial outcomes of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@HF@@@, including reductions in all-cause mortality and @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Failure</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@HF@@@ hospitalization.
